name: GeneralKnowledgeTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open general knowledge trivia”
”Alexa, start general knowledge trivia”
”Alexa, launch general knowledge trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: general knowledge trivia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"General Knowledge Trivia" is an Alexa skill designed to test your general knowledge. Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.
The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.
